dcterms:creator: K. Ahuja
K. Shanmugam
A. Dhurandhar
dcterms:description: A modified version of the MNIST dataset where colors are used as spurious features. Digits less than 5 are attributed with label 0 and the rest with label 1. The dataset is divided across three clients, with two serving as training and one as testing.
dcterms:title: Colored MNIST

dcterms:creator: K. Ahuja
K. Shanmugam
A. Dhurandhar
dcterms:description: A modified version of the Fashion MNIST dataset where colors are used as spurious features. The dataset includes various clothing items and footwear, with spurious correlations introduced through color coding.
dcterms:title: Colored Fashion MNIST

dcterms:creator: K. Ahuja
K. Shanmugam
A. Dhurandhar
dcterms:description: A modified version of the CIFAR-10 dataset where small black patches are added to images to create spurious correlations with the labels. The dataset is used for binary classification between motor and non-motor objects.
dcterms:title: Spurious CIFAR10
